Description: Increases the window to perform a perfect evade.
Effect: Makes perfect evades ever so slightly easier to perform.
Makes perfect evades slightly easier to perform.
Makes perfect evades moderately easier to perform.
Makes perfect evades much easier to perform.
Makes perfect evades significantly easier to perform.

Description: Increases Attack Power.
Effect: Increases attack power by 20.
Increases attack power by 40.
Increases attack power by 60.
Increases attack power by 80.
Increases attack power by 120.

Description: Landing consecutive hits in a short span of time temporarily increases your attack power.
Effect: Landing consecutive hits in a short span of time increases attack power by 5% for 4 seconds.
Landing consecutive hits in a short span of time increases attack power by 10% for 4 seconds.
Landing consecutive hits in a short span of time increases attack power by 15% for 4 seconds.
Landing consecutive hits in a short span of time increases attack power by 20% for 4 seconds.
Landing consecutive hits in a short span of time increases attack power by 30% for 4 seconds.

Effect: Increases Special Gauge fill rate by 5%.
Increases Special Gauge fill rate by 10%.
Increases Special Gauge fill rate by 15%.

Effect: Increases affinity by 10%.
Increases affinity by 15%.
Increases affinity by 20%.
Increases affinity by 30%.
Increases affinity by 40%.

Description: Increases defense.
Effect: Increases defense by 20.
Increases defense by 40.
Increases defense by 60.
Increases defense by 80.
Increases defense by 100.

Description: Provides a chance to reduce damage taken from an attack.
Effect: 30% chance of reducing damage from a monster's attack by 50%.
40% chance of reducing damage from a monster's attack by 50%.
50% chance of reducing damage from a monster's attack by 50%.
50% chance of reducing damage from a monster's attack by 60%.
50% chance of reducing damage from a monster's attack by 80%.

Description: Reduces the effect of monster roars.
Effect: Moderately reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
Nullifies the effects of weak monster roars, and slightly reduces the effects of strong monster roars.
Nullifies the effects of weak monster roars, and moderately reduces the effects of strong monster roars.
Nullifies the effects of weak monster roars, and significantly reduces the effects of strong monster roars.
Nullifies the effects of both weak and strong monster roars.

Description: Extends evasion distane.
Effect: Very slightly extends evasion distance.
Slightly extends evasion distance.
Moderately extends evasion distance.
Greatly extends evasion distance.
Massively extends evasion distance.

Description: Increases weapon's fire-element value.
Effect: Increases weapon's fire-element value by 50.
Increases weapon's fire-element value by 100.
Increases weapon's fire-element value by 200.
Increases weapon's fire-element value by 350.
Increases weapon's fire-element value by 500.

Decreases damage taken from fire-element monsters by 20%.
Decreases damage taken from fire-element monsters by 30%.
Decreases damage taken from fire-element monsters by 40%.
Decreases damage taken from fire-element monsters by 50%.

Description: Reduces knockback when taking damage.
Effect: Very slightly reduces knockback when taking damage.
Slightly reduces knockback when taking damage.
Moderately reduces knockback when taking damage.

Description: Shortens charging time for weapons with charge attacks, and increases the fill rate of the Spirit Gauge.
Effect: Shortens charging time for weapons with charge attacks by 5%, and increases the fill rate of the Spirit Gauge by 5%.
Shortens charging time for weapons with charge attacks by 10%, and increases the fill rate of the Spirit Gauge by 10%.
Shortens charging time for weapons with charge attacks by 15%, and increases the fill rate of the Spirit Gauge by 15%.
Shortens charging time for weapons with charge attacks by 20%, and increases the fill rate of the Spirit Gauge by 20%.
Shortens charging time for weapons with charge attacks by 30%, and increases the fill rate of the Spirit Gauge by 30%.

Description: Increases attack power for 10 seconds each time you revive after fainting in a hunt.
Effect: Increases attack power by 10% for 10 seconds each time you revive after fainting during a hunt.
Increases attack power by 15% for 10 seconds each time you revive after fainting during a hunt.
Increases attack power by 20% for 10 seconds each time you revive after fainting during a hunt.
Increases attack power by 30% for 10 seconds each time you revive after fainting during a hunt.
Increases attack power by 40% for 10 seconds each time you revive after fainting during a hunt.

Slightly reduces damage and knockback guarding against monster attacks.
Moderately reduces damage and knockback guarding against monster attacks.
Greatly reduces damage and knockback guarding against monster attacks.
Massively reduces damage and knockback guarding against monster attacks.

Effect: Up to 1 time(s) per hunt, survive lethal damage taken at 80 health or above.
Up to 1 time(s) per hunt, survive lethal damage taken at 70 health or above.
Up to 1 time(s) per hunt, survive lethal damage taken at 60 health or above.
Up to 1 time(s) per hunt, survive lethal damage taken at 50 health or above.
Up to 1 time(s) per hunt, survive lethal damage taken at 40 health or above.

Increases health by 20.
Increases health by 30.

Increases health by 50.
